The humble representation of the Commissioners of the Generall Assembly to the honorable estates of Parliament; upon their declaration lately communicated to us. Subscribitur, A. Ker. Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission. Ker, A.
24 p.
Printed for John Dallom, dwelling in Black Fryers, London : 1648.
Signed at end: A. Ker. Annotation on Thomason copy: "May. 15". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
